## By deprecating package

```{r}
r = read.csv("pkgapi_no_sp_220713.csv", header = FALSE)
r$n_pkg = lengths(strsplit(r[[3]], " "))
r$`function` = paste(r[[1]], r[[2]], sep = ":")
r$packages = r[["V3"]]
# r$packages[r$n_pkg > 9] = ""
r[["V1"]] = r[["V2"]] = r[["V3"]] = NULL
r_o = r[order(r$n_pkg, decreasing = TRUE),]
```

```{r echo=FALSE, as.is=TRUE}
library(knitr)
kable(r_o)
```

## By depending package

```{r}
r = read.csv("pkgapi_no_sp_by_pkg_220713.csv", header = FALSE)
names(r) = c("package", "deps")
r$n_pkg = lengths(strsplit(r$deps, " ")) - 1 # leading space
kable(r[order(r$n_pkg, decreasing = TRUE),c(3,1,2)])
```
